title: Week 2 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Players to Drop - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/13
description:
Waiver wire show! On today’s fantasy football podcast, players to consider adding and dropping for your roster! Andy, Mike, and Jason discuss the top waiver adds at each position and react to the Broncos vs Seahawks game! Plus, the latest injury news, and QB Streamers! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. Fantasy Football Podcast for September 13th, 2022

Connect with the show:
